p: The current article is a direct answer to the aforementioned issues. Its aims are: (I) to provide a precise review of the scientific literature from 2008 to 2018, (II) select promising studies with clear practical application and (III) an overall assessment of the reviewed achievements in order to identify the most perspective development directions of rosin-based chemicals. The review is presented in a modern, pleasant-to-browse form, illustrated with patiently completed reaction schemes. The article provides concise, but exhaustive information on the achievements in preparation of rosin-derived chemicals in the last decade. Its main idea is to inspire and encourage the world of science to actively take interest in rosin and the possibilities of its modification.
